merge.title: Merge two entries
merge.info: Merging these entries would change the time by {change}

jira_instances.title: Jira Instances
jira_instances.name: Name
jira_instances.test_connection_disabled: Jira User and Cloud ID are required to test the connection.
jira_instances.add_projects_disabled: Jira User and Cloud ID are required to add projects.
jira_instances.add_projects_tooltip: Add all Jira Projects as Timify Project.
jira_instances.add_projects_name_exists: A project with this name already exists.

tour.confirm_exit: Do you really want to cancel the tour? You can restart the tour at any time from the settings.
tour.welcome: Hello, I can help you and give you a tour so you can find your way around this very complex application.
tour.timer: I know, this is a very complicated timer and not at all self-explanatory. It shows your current tracked time in hours:minutes:seconds. Complicated, right?
tour.controls: These buttons are also very complicated. Here you can start, pause, or stop tracking your work or break time.
tour.week: Here you find the week number and your total tracked time for this week.
tour.part1_end: It looks like you haven't tracked any time in the current week yet. Create your first entry and we can continue with the tour.

day.title: Day Information
day.info: Here you can find all information about a specific day.
day.weekday: Here you'll see the weekday and the corresponding date. I know - not self-explanatory.
day.total: Here you can see the tracked work time (above) and break time (below).

entry.title: Entry Information
entry.type: This icon indicates whether it is a work period or a break.
entry.start: Here you'll see the time when you started this entry.
entry.end: Here you'll see the time when you ended this entry. If the entry is still running, you'll see three dots.
entry.total: Here you find the information on how many hours and minutes were tracked here. Seconds are tracked in the background, but not displayed.
entry.project: Here you can specify a client/project, allowing you to group work times.
entry.project_code: Here you can specify a project code to further categorize your tracked time for a client/project, for example, a ticket number.
entry.options_more: Here you can access more options, such as turning work time into break time, break time into work time, deleting the entry, or transferring the tracked time to Jira. You can also merge two entries. Either upwards or downwards, depending on where an entry is located. This will transfer the start or end time to the other entry. The type of your tracked time will not change.

tour.ready_to_go: Okay, now you should be familiar with the app. Go and create something great, get rich, or just get through your nine-to-five.
